title: Slow-cooker beef rogan josh
directions: Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Add onion. Cook, stirring, for 5 minutes or until softened. Add curry paste. Cook, stirring, for 30 seconds or until fragrant. Add beef to pan. Cook, stirring, until just browned. Transfer mixture to bowl of a 5.5-litre slow cooker.
Add potato, carrot, stock, coconut milk, sugar, fish sauce, and lime juice. Stir to combine. Cover. Cook on low for 5 hours or until beef and vegetables are tender.
Cook, uncovered, for a further 30 to 45 minutes or until sauce thickens.
ingredients: 2 medium potatoes, peeled, cut into 2cm pieces
1 large carrot, peeled, cut into 1cm-thick slices
